TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FontWeights extends System.Object
public ref class FontWeights abstract sealed

summary.span: 一連の定義済みの静的な 値を提供します。

span.span: Provides a set of static predefined values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks フォントの太さには、フォント、またはストロークの太さの観点からの相対的な重みがについて説明します。A font weight describes the relative weight of a font, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes. 太さの違いは、増加したストロークまたはを同じフォントの「通常」の文字と比較して、フォントの特定の文字に関連付けられている太さによって一般に区別されます。Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness that is associated with a given character in a font, as compared to a "normal" character from that same font. 値に対応して、`usWeightClass`内の定義、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]仕様です。The values correspond to the `usWeightClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. `usWeightClass` 1 から 999 までの整数値を表します。The `usWeightClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 999. 値が小さいほど明るい重みです。高い値は、高い負荷に対応する重みを示します。Lower values indicate lighter weights; higher values indicate heavier weights. |文字の太さFont weight|usWeightClassusWeightClass| |-----------------|-------------------| ||100100| |

|200200| ||300300| |

|400400| ||500500| |

|600600| ||700700| |

|800800| |

|900900| |

|950950| 詳細については、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWeightClass`値を参照してください、 ["フォント ファイル Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm)のセクションで、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]仕様です。For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWeightClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. ## Examples 次のコード例では、 "UltraBold"に設定されています。In the following code example, the is set to "UltraBold". [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#fontsnippet12)]
